snippet.title: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game - Gameplay Overview Trailer
snippet.description:
Pre-order now: https://www.focus-entmt.com/games/expeditions-a-mudrunner-game?utm_campaign=EXP_GameplayOverview&utm_medium=description&utm_source=YouTube

Get ready to embark on a thrilling scientific adventure! Here is an overview of all the ways you can conquer the immense wilderness that awaits you in Expeditions.

To overcome all the challenges, select carefully the tools that will accompany you. Each successful mission also earns you a sum of money, which you can invest in new, even more efficient vehicles, or in a wide range of parts to improve them. Be forward-thinking and creative!

Pre-order the Supreme Edition, Year 1 Edition or Standard Edition of Expeditions: A MudRunner Game now on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One or PC to get exclusive content! 

Expeditions: A MudRunner Game will be available on March 5, 2024.
